name: Ashen Custodian
description: The Ashen Custodian is a Medium-sized fey creature with exceptional agility and strong magical abilities. It stands out with its fiery features and serves as a guardian of forest sanctity.
memorable: It effectively manipulates fire on the battlefield and possesses strong magical resistance, making it a challenging adversary.
goals: To protect the forest's sanctity and control the element of fire.
relations: May be encountered alongside other forest guardians or fire elementals.
environment: Typically found in forested areas or places with significant fire presence.
strengths: Immunity to fire damage and resistance to nonmagical physical damage.
attacks: Utilizes Cleansing Strike, a melee attack dealing bludgeoning and fire damage, with additional effects against plant creatures.
most_powerful_ability: Fire Controller allows manipulation of fires within a designated area as a bonus action.
spellcasting: Innate spellcasting capability with access to spells like burning hands and wall of fire.
senses: Possesses a passive perception of 15, indicating alertness to surroundings.
skills: Skilled in nature and perception, enhancing its abilities to navigate its environment.
additional_information: Cleansing Strike can ignite targets, causing continuous fire damage.
Warming Presence deals fire damage to nearby hostile creatures.
Can heal friendly creatures with additional hit points when they regain health.
Has a Magic Resistance trait, providing advantage on saving throws against spells.
Can manipulate fire, affecting battlefield conditions significantly.
